original_text: The apostles were still looking carefully up into the sky when suddenly two men appeared. They were wearing white clothes and they stood near the apostles.
korean_text: 올라가실 때에 제자들이 자세히 하늘을 쳐다보고 있는데 흰 옷 입은 두 사람이 그들 곁에 서서

sentences.original_text: The apostles were still looking carefully up into the sky
sentences.korean_translation: 사도들이 여전히 하늘을 주의 깊게 쳐다보고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and they stood near the apostles
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 사도들 가까이에 서 있었습니다
